ValidationRule.description: Part of Requirement 17493: This validation rule insures that only senior deputies can mark a liability as dismissed. Updated for BOFE Senior Deputy Permissions
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF (RecordType.DeveloperName == 'BOFE_Liability', IF (ISPICKVAL(Status__c , 'Administrative Dismissal'), IF ($Permission.BOFE_Senior_Deputy, FALSE, TRUE), FALSE), FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only BOFE Senior Deputies can update the status of liabilities to Administrative Dismissal.
